title: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: When removing a working set, the changes are immediately applied without any confirmation or prompt.
OB:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Notice that the package view is filtered based on the selected working set.
EB:
1. Remove the working set.
2. Confirm that no prompt or confirmation message appears.
3. Notice that the package view is no longer filtered and displays all packages.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Right-click on the working set in the working set view.
3. Select 'Remove' from the context menu.
4. Verify that no prompt or confirmation message appears.
5. Observe that the package view is no longer filtered and displays all packages.
